meanings: one's sense, (지각) [명사] consciousness, [동사] be conscious (of), be aware (of)

vlive.korean: 프로의 의식이 있네 - 프로잖아! You have professional minds. - We are pros. 듣기 View video Stray Kids : 산을 넘어 산호세로 ~~❤
vlive.english: You have professional minds. - We are pros.

vlive.korean: 그래! 오늘은 약간 그런 느낌이다 의식의 흐름 방송! Yeah! Today's broadcast is kind of like that! A stream of consciousness. 듣기 View video VICTON : 잠깐만..🖤-@
vlive.english: Yeah! Today's broadcast is kind of like that! A stream of consciousness.

vlive.korean: 근데 그건 의식했다? I thought that though. 듣기 View video Stray Kids : [Two Kids Room(투키즈룸)] VOL.5 Ep.04 우진 X 창빈
[카메라 의식 중] 밥은 먹었어? [Camera-conscious] Have you eaten? 듣기 View video GOT7 : GOT7(갓세븐) HOTLINE #8
의식의 흐름 개오진다고요? The flow of my consciousness is amazing? 듣기 View video WINNER : 불금
vlive.english: The flow of my consciousness is amazing?

examples.korean: to observe the solemnities of the occasion 듣기 Add to Wordbook 행사의 의식 절차를 준수하다 Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
